why.title: Why Sellers Love ArcNxt
why.subtitle: Everything is built to help you sell easily and grow your business

items.title: 0% Commission Fee
items.desc: Sell on ArcNxt without paying any commission and keep 100% of your earnings.

items.title: 0 Penalty Charges
items.desc: No penalties for order cancellations or dispatch delays. Sell with confidence.

items.title: Growth for Every Seller
items.desc: From small sellers to growing brands, and from unbranded to branded products, ArcNxt supports everyone ‚Äî including eligible sellers without a regular GSTIN.

items.title: Easy to Do Business
points: Easy product listing ‚Äì Our team helps you list your products smoothly
Affordable shipping ‚Äì Shipping is handled by ArcNxt at low cost
Fast payments ‚Äì ArcNxt ensures quick and secure bank settlements
Focus on your business and relax ‚Äî ArcNxt takes care of everything for you at zero cost.

rewards.title: Exclusive Seller Rewards ‚Äì Limited Time Offer
rewards.subtitle: Designed to help new sellers start strong and grow faster. Join now to get these benefits, only on ArcNxt.

items.title: Free Product Listing
items.desc: List unlimited products on ArcNxt at no cost and start selling immediately.

items.title: Free Product Visibility
items.desc: Get boosted visibility for your products to attract more buyers.

items.title: No Return Charges on First 10 Orders
items.desc: Enjoy zero return charges for your first 10 orders, reducing your initial risk.

items.title: No Order Cancellation Charges
items.desc: Cancel orders you cannot fulfil without worrying about penalties.

items.title: Faster Payments
items.desc: Receive your earnings quickly in your bank account for smooth cash flow.

items.title: Lowest Return Charges
items.desc: ArcNxt offers one of the lowest return charges across all marketplaces.

items.name: Dhruvin Mehta
items.quote: Before joining ArcNxt, reaching customers outside our local area was difficult. With ArcNxt, we were able to sell our jewellery to customers across India and grow our business step by step with confidence.

items.name: Punya Jain
items.quote: ArcNxt made it easy for us to start online selling. The onboarding process was simple, and within a short time, we began receiving regular orders, which helped us build steady sales.

items.name: Amber Aggarwal
items.quote: Selling online felt complicated earlier, but ArcNxt simplified everything. From listing products to managing orders, the platform helped us run our business smoothly and reliably.

steps.title: Create Account
steps.desc: GSTIN (for GST sellers) or Enrolment ID / UIN (for non-GST sellers Coming Soon) and a valid bank account.

steps.title: List Products
steps.desc: List the products you want to sell from your seller panel. Our dedicated team helps you list your products for free, so you can focus on selling.

steps.title: Start Getting Orders
steps.desc: Start receiving orders from customers shopping across India.

steps.title: Affordable Shipping
steps.desc: Ship products nationwide using affordable and reliable logistics.

steps.title: Receive Payments
steps.desc: Payments are deposited directly into your bank account after a 5-day settlement cycle.

learningZone.title: ArcNxt Learning Zone
learningZone.desc: Learn how to sell, manage orders, and grow your business on ArcNxt with easy guides, video tutorials, and practical seller tips.

items.title: Affordable Shipping Across India
items.desc: Ship your products across India with wide delivery coverage and budget-friendly shipping.

items.title: Next-Day Dispatch Program
items.desc: Designed for qualifying sellers, this program enables quicker order dispatch with priority support and personalized account assistance.

items.title: Free Product Listing
items.desc: Save your time on setup and focus on selling while we take care of product listing.

items.title: Business Insights
items.desc: Track your sales performance and make informed decisions using clear and actionable insights.
